<title level="1" right="Rules">[Preparing a Staff](/Rules.aspx?ID=3214)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 278 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
During your [daily preparations](/Rules.aspx?ID=2575), you can prepare a staff to add charges to it for free. When you do so, that staff gains a number of charges equal to the rank of your highest spell slot. You don’t need to expend any spells to add charges in this way. No one can prepare more than one staff per day, nor can a staff be prepared by more than one person per day. If the charges aren’t used within 24 hours, they’re lost, and preparing the staff anew removes any charges previously stored in it. You can prepare a staff only if you have at least one of the staff’s spells on your spell list.
</column>

</row>
